mapper.insert: insert into record (url, cover_url, title, description, type) values (#{record.url}, #{record.coverUrl}, #{record.title}, #{record.description}, #{record.type})
mapper.select: select id,url, cover_url, type, title, description, created from record order by created desc

select rc.record_id,r.url, r.cover_url, r.type, r.title, r.description, r.created from record_collection rc left join record r on r.id = rc.record_id where rc.collection_id = #{collectionId} order by r.created desc
select id from record where title=#{title} limit 1
